column3: EVT (Edition Visualization Technology) is a software designed for web-based digital editions of diplomatic texts. It provides a complete set of flexible and highly customizable tools developed to enable users to visualize; read; and compare editions in an electronic environment.
column5: Giulia Cacioli; Chiara Di Pietro; Angelo Del Grosso ( https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4867-6304 ); Chiara Martignano; Jurgen Memaj; Federica Spinelli; Simone Zenzaro.
column6: Laboratorio di Cultura Digitale (LabCD); Università di Pisa
column15: Digital Vercelli Book http://vbd.humnet.unipi.it/ ; Codice Pelavicino https://pelavicino.labcd.unipi.it/

column3: Voyant Tools is a web-based text reading and analysis environment. It is a scholarly project that is designed to facilitate reading and interpretive practices for digital humanities students and scholars as well as for the general public.
column5: Andrew MacDonald ; Kaylin Land ; Bennett Kuwan Tchoh ; Ayushi Khemka ; Catherine Bevan ; Elliot Damasah ; Cyril Briquet ; Lisa Goddard ; Mark Turcato
column30: HTML https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/HTML ; XML https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/XML ; PDF https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/PDF ; RTF  https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/RTF ; DOCX https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/DOCX ; TXT https://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type/TXT
